isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - ROCKWELL 9, 10, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS - INSTALL - CLUTCH HOUSING

note.para: Clutch housings for Design Level 1 transmissions cannot be used on Design Level 2 transmissions. Clutch housings for Design Level 2 transmissions can be used on Design Level 1 transmissions.

step1.para: Use Loctite RTV Sealant #5699 or equivalent to put a new sealant pattern for the clutch housing on the transmission case. Make sure the sealant is installed in the pattern shown in Figure 354. Refer to INSTALLING THE SEALANT section.
Install the clutch housing on the transmission case.
Install the mounting nuts and washers on the studs on the clutch housing. Tighten the nuts to 203 to 258 Nm (150 to 190 ft-lbs.).
Apply Loctite #222 or equivalent to the threads of the bolts that fasten the clutch housing to the main case.
Install the mounting bolts and washers and tighten to 88 to 115 Nm (65 to 85 ft-lbs.).
